Nom.description: The name of the climbing route.

Cotation.description: The difficulty rating of the climbing route.

Couleur.description: The color of the holds used in the climbing route.

Relais.description: The location of the anchor point at the top of the climbing route.

Commentaire.description: Any additional comments about the climbing route.

Ouvreur.description: The name of the person who created this route.

Date.description: A timestamp of when this route was created.

Départ assis.description: Whether or not this climbing route starts from a sitting position.

Module.description: Whether or not a modules are allowed on this climbing route.

Arête.description: Whether or not edges are allowed on this climbing route.

Dièdre.description: Whether or not dihedrals are allowed on this climbing route.
